subject: Skiing
World Cup (Skiing)
Alpine Skiing
lead_paragraph: Ted Ligety and Bode Miller of the United States took gold and silver in the giant slalom race in Beaver Creek, Colo., the first time since 2005 that two American men have gone one-two in a giant slalom.
snippet: Ted Ligety and Bode Miller of the United States took gold and silver in the giant slalom race in Beaver Creek, Colo., the first time since 2005 that two American men have gone one-two in a giant slalom.
